member.name: P:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.PayPalUrl
member.summary:
Required: Yes, for ExpressCheckout based API calls
Gets or Sets the base URL for redirecting the payer to PayPal. If not set, looks for "paypalURL" value in Web.Config encore.PayPal.NVP section.
Default: https://www.paypal.com/

member.name: P:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.SkipReview
member.summary:
Required: No.
Set to true to make the checkout appear to complete on the PayPal site, not your own, and entirely bypass your own order review page.
(After the customer returns from the PayPal site, you must call the DoExpressCheckoutPayment API to actually complete the transaction.)
For example, if you do not want to display an “Order Review” page on your site after the customer returns from PayPal, you want the
button text on PayPal to read Pay. Default: false.

member.name: P:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.RedirectUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL to which you redirect the user to log into PayPal and accept the transaction.

member.name: T:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request
member.summary:
Parameter names for a SetExpressCheckout request.
Use these in the NvpSetExpressCheckout.Add() function for convenience. Required parameters show first. The underscore on required parameters will not be included.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request._RETURNURL
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
URL to which the customer’s browser is returned after choosing to pay with PayPal. NOTE: PayPal recommends that the value be the final review page on which
the customer confirms the order and payment or billing agreement. Character length and limitations: no limit.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request._CANCELURL
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
URL to which the customer is returned if he does not approve the use of PayPal to pay you. NOTE: PayPal recommends that the value be the original page on which
the customer chose to pay with PayPal or establish a billing agreement. Character length and limitations: no limit.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request._AMT
F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.CURRENCYCODE
member.summary:
Required: No.
A three-character currency code for one of the currencies listed in PayPal-Supported Transactional Currencies.
Default: USD

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.MAXAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
The expected maximum total amount of the complete order, including shipping cost and tax charges. If the transaction does not include a one-time purchase, this field is ignored.
Limitations: Must not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.PAYMENTACTION
member.summary:
Required: No.
How you want to obtain payment: Sale indicates that this is a final sale for which you are requesting payment.
Authorization indicates that this payment is a basic authorization subject to settlement with PayPal Authorization and Capture.
Order indicates that this payment is an order authorization subject to settlement with PayPal Authorization and Capture.
If the transaction does not include a one-time purchase, this field is ignored. NOTE: You cannot set this value to Sale in SetExpressCheckout request and then change
this value to Authorization or Order on the final API DoExpressCheckoutPayment request. If the value is set to Authorization or Order in SetExpressCheckout, the value may be set
to Sale or the same value (either Authorization or Order) in DoExpressCheckoutPayment. Character length and limit: Up to 13 single-byte alphabetic characters.
Default value: Sale

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.ITEMAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sum of cost of all items in this order. Limitations: The value must be a positive number and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
NOTE: ITEMAMT is required if you specify L_AMTn.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.SHIPPINGAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Total shipping costs for this order. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
NOTE: If you specify a value for SHIPPINGAMT, you must also specify a value for ITEMAMT.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.SHIPDISCAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Shipping discount for this order, specified as a negative number. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.INSURANCEAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Total shipping insurance costs for this order. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.HANDLINGAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Total handling costs for this order. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
NOTE: If you specify a value for HANDLINGAMT, you must specify a value for ITEMAMT.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.TAXAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sum of tax for all items in this order. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
NOTE: TAXAMT is required if you specify L_TAXAMTn

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_NAMEn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Item name. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte characters.
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_NAME0, L_NAME1).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_DESCn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Item description. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte characters.
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_DESC0, L_DESC1).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_NUMBERn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Item number. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte characters.
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_NUMBER0, L_NUMBER1).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_QTYn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Item quantity. Character length and limitations: Any positive integer.
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_QTY0, L_QTY1).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_TAXAMTn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Item sales tax. Limitations: Must not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_TAXAMT0, L_TAXAMT1).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_AMTn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Cost of item. Limitations: Value can be positive, negative or zero and must not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
These parameters must be ordered sequentially beginning with 0 (for example L_AMT0, L_AMT1). NOTE: If you specify a value for L_AMTn, you must specify a value for ITEMAMT.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_EBAYITEMNUMBERn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Auction item number. Character length and limitations: 765 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_EBAYITEMAUCTIONTXNIDn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Auction transaction identification number Character length and limitations: 255 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_EBAYITEMORDERIDn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Auction order identification number. Character length and limitations: 64 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.EMAIL
member.summary:
Required: No.
Email address of the buyer as entered during checkout. PayPal uses this value to pre-fill the PayPal membership sign-up portion of the PayPal login page.
Character length and limit: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.DESC
member.summary:
Required: No.
Description of items the customer is purchasing. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.CUSTOM
member.summary:
Required: No.
A free-form field for your own use, such as a tracking number or other value you want PayPal to return on GetExpressCheckoutDetails response and DoExpressCheckoutPayment response.
Character length and limitations: 256 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.INVNUM
member.summary:
Required: No.
Your own unique invoice or tracking number. PayPal returns this value to you on DoExpressCheckoutPayment response.
If the transaction does not include a one-time purchase, this field is ignored. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.ALLOWNOTE
member.summary:
Required: No.
The value 1 indicates that the customer may enter a note to the merchant on the PayPal page during checkout. The note is returned in the
GetExpressCheckoutDetails response and the DoExpressCheckoutPayment response. Character length and limitations: One single-byte numeric character. Allowable values: 0, 1

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.REQCONFIRMSHIPPING
member.summary:
Required: No.
The value 1 indicates that you require that the customer’s shipping address on file with PayPal be a confirmed address.
NOTE: Setting this field overrides the setting you have specified in your Merchant Account Profile.
Character length and limitations: One single-byte numeric character. Allowable values: 0, 1
Default: 0

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.NOSHIPPING
member.summary:
Required: No.
The value 1 indicates that on the PayPal pages, no shipping address fields should be displayed whatsoever.
Character length and limitations: One single-byte numeric character. Allowable values: 0, 1
Default: 0

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.ADDROVERRIDE
member.summary:
Required: No.
The value 1 indicates that the PayPal pages should display the shipping address set by you in this SetExpressCheckout request, not the shipping address on file with PayPal for this customer.
Displaying the PayPal street address on file does not allow the customer to edit that address. Character length and limitations: One single-byte numeric character.
Allowable values: 0, 1 Default: 0

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.TOKEN
member.summary:
Required: No.
A timestamped token by which you identify to PayPal that you are processing this payment with Express Checkout.
NOTE: The token expires after three hours. If you set the token in the SetExpressCheckout request, the value of
the token in the response is identical to the value in the request. Character length and limitations: 20 single-byte characters

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.BUTTONSOURCE
member.summary:
Required: No.
An identification code for use by third-party applications to identify transactions. Character length and limitations: 32 single-byte alphanumeric characters

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.NOTIFYURL
member.summary:
Required: No.
Your URL for receiving Instant Payment Notification (IPN) about this transaction. NOTE: If you do not specify this URL in the request, the notification URL from
your Merchant Profile is used, if one exists. Character length and limitations: 2,048 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.LANDINGPAGE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Type of PayPal page to display: Billing: non-PayPal account
Login: PayPal account login

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.LOCALECODE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Locale of pages displayed by PayPal during Express Checkout. Character length and limitations: Any two-character country code.
The following two-character country codes are supported by PayPal: AU, DE, FR, IT, GB, ES, or US
Any other value will default to US.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.PAGESTYLE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sets the Custom Payment Page Style for payment pages associated with this button/link. This value corresponds to the HTML variable page_style for customizing payment pages.
The value is the same as the Page Style Name you chose when adding or editing the page style from the Profile subtab of the My Account tab of your PayPal account.
Character length and limitations: 30 single-byte alphabetic characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.HDRIMG
member.summary:
Required: No.
URL for the image you want to appear at the top left of the payment page. The image has a maximum size of 750 pixels wide by 90 pixels high.
PayPal recommends that you provide an image that is stored on a secure (https) server. If you do not specify an image, the business name is displayed.
Character length and limit: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.HDRBORDERCOLOR
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sets the border color around the header of the payment page. The border is a 2-pixel perimeter around the header space, which is 750 pixels wide by 90 pixels high.
By default, the color is black. Character length and limitations: Six character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.HDRBACKCOLOR
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sets the background color for the header of the payment page. By default, the color is white.
Character length and limitations: Six character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.PAYFLOWCOLOR
member.summary:
Required: No.
Sets the background color for the payment page. By default, the color is white.
Character length and limitations: Six character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.CHANNELTYPE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Type of channel: Merchant: non-auction seller; eBayItem: eBay auction. If the transaction does not include a one-time purchase, this field is ignored.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.SOLUTIONTYPE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Type of checkout flow: Sole: Express Checkout for auctions; Mark: normal Express Checkout. If the transaction does not include a one-time purchase, this field is ignored.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.GIROPAYSUCCESSURL
member.summary:
Required: No.
The URL on the merchant site to redirect to after a successful giropay payment. Use this field only if you are using giropay or bank transfer payment methods in Germany.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.GIROPAYCANCELURL
member.summary:
Required: No.
The URL on the merchant site to redirect to after a giropay or bank transfer payment is cancelled or fails. Use this field only if you are using giropay or bank transfer payment methods in Germany.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.BANKTXNPENDINGURL
member.summary:
Required: No.
The URL on the merchant site to transfer to after a bank transfer payment. Use this field only if you are using giropay or bank transfer payment methods in Germany.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_BILLINGTYPEn
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if using ExpressCheckout to create billing agreements.
Type of billing agreement. For recurring payments, this field is required and must be set to RecurringPayments.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_BILLINGAGREEMENTDESCRIPTIONn
member.summary:

Description of goods or services associated with the billing agreement. PayPal recommends that you provide a brief summary of the terms and conditions of the billing agreement.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_CUSTOMn
member.summary:
Required: No.
Custom annotation field for your own use. NOTE: This field is ignored for recurring payments.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpSetExpressCheckout.Request.L_PAYMENTTYPEn
member.summary:

Specifies type of PayPal payment you require for the billing agreement, which is one of the following values: Any or InstantOnly
NOTE: This field is ignored for recurring payments.

Phone number. Character length and limit: 20 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.PARENTTRANSACTIONID
member.summary:
Original transaction to which this transaction is related.
This field is populated for the following transaction types: Reversal.
Capture of an authorized transaction. Reauthorization of a transaction.
Capture of an order -- the value of ParentTransactionID is the original OrderID. Authorization of an order -- the value of ParentTransactionID is the original OrderID.
Capture of an order authorization. Void of an order -- the value of ParentTransactionID is the original OrderID.
Character length and limitations: 19 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.TRANSACTIONID
member.summary:
PayPal transaction identification number.
Character length and limitations: 19 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.RECEIPTID
member.summary:
Receipt ID.
Character length and limitations: 16 digits in xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx format.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.TRANSACTIONTYPE
member.summary:
The type of transaction:
cart -- transaction created by customer via the PayPal Shopping Cart feature. send-money -- transaction created by customer from the Send Money tab on the PayPal website.
web-accept -- transaction created by customer via Buy Now, Donation, or Auction Smart Logos. subscr-* -- transaction created by customer via Subscription. eot means "end of subscription term."
merch-pmt -- preapproved payment. mass-pay -- transaction created via MassPay.
virtual-terminal -- transaction created via merchant virtual terminal.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.PAYMENTTYPE
member.summary:
Indicates whether the payment is instant or delayed.
Character length and limitations: Seven single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.ORDERTIME
member.summary: Date and time of payment.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.AMT
member.summary: Full amount of the customer’s payment, before transaction fee is subtracted.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.CURRENCYCODE
member.summary: The currency for the transaction.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.FEEAMT
member.summary: Transaction fee associated with the payment.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.SETTLEAMT
member.summary:
Amount deposited into the account’s primary balance after a currency conversion
from automatic conversion through your Payment Receiving Preferences or manual conversion through manually accepting a payment. This amount is calculated after
fees and taxes have been assessed.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.TAXAMT
member.summary: Amount of tax for transaction.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.EXCHANGERATE
member.summary: Exchange rate for transaction.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.PAYMENTSTATUS
member.summary:
The status of the payment:
None -- no status. Canceled-Reversal -- this means a reversal has been canceled.
For example,you won a dispute with the customer, and the funds for the transaction that was reversed have been returned to you.
Completed -- the payment has been completed, and the funds have been added successfully to your account balance.
Denied -- you denied the payment. This happens only if the payment was previously pending because of possible reasons described for the PendingReason element.
Expired -- the authorization period for this payment has been reached. Failed -- the payment has failed. This happens only if the payment was made
from your customer’s bank account. Pending -- the payment is pending. See the PendingReason field for more information.
Refunded -- you refunded the payment. Reversed -- a payment was reversed due to a chargeback or other type of reversal.
The funds have been removed from your account balance and returned to the buyer. The reason for the reversal is specified in the ReasonCode element.
Processed -- a payment has been accepted. Voided -- an authorization for this transaction has been voided.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.PENDINGREASON
member.summary:
NOTE: PendingReason is returned in the response only if PaymentStatus is Pending.
The reason the payment is pending: none -- no pending reason.
address -- the payment is pending because your customer did not include a confirmed shipping address and your Payment Receiving Preferences is set such that you want
to manually accept or deny each of these payments. To change your preference, go to the Preferences section of your Profile.
echeck -- the payment is pending because it was made by an eCheck that has not yet cleared. intl -- the payment is pending because you hold a non-U.S. account and do not have a withdrawal
mechanism. You must manually accept or deny this payment from your Account Overview. multi-currency -- you do not have a balance in the currency sent, and you do not have
your Payment Receiving Preferences set to automatically convert and accept this payment. You must manually accept or deny this payment.
verify -- the payment is pending because you are not yet verified. You must verify your account before you can accept this payment.
other -- the payment is pending for a reason other than those listed above. For more information, contact PayPal Customer Service.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetTransactionDetails.Response.REASONCODE
member.summary:
The reason for a reversal if TransactionType is reversal:
none -- no reason code. chargeback -- a reversal has occurred on this transaction due to a chargeback by your customer.
guarantee -- a reversal has occurred on this transaction due to your customer triggering a money-back guarantee. buyer-complaint -- a reversal has occurred on this transaction due to a complaint about the transaction from your customer.
refund -- a reversal has occurred on this transaction because you have given the customer a refund. other -- a reversal has occurred on this transaction due to a reason not listed above.

Invoice number you set in the original transaction.

member.name: T:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile
member.summary:
Create this object to make a CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile API call.
Minimum requirements -- add these name-value pairs and call Post(): PROFILESTARTDATE
BILLINGPERIOD BILLINGFREQUENCY
AMT TOKEN or required CreditCard parameters.

member.name: T:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request
member.summary:
Parameter names for a CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request.
Use these in the NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Add() function for convenience. Required parameters show first. The underscore on required parameters will not be included.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._TOKEN
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with Express Checkout.
A timestamped token, the value of which was returned in the response to the first call to SetExpressCheckout. You can also use the token returned
in the SetCustomerBillingAgreement response. Only one recurring payment profile is allowed for each CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request. The same token may
be used by multiple CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile calls to set up multiple recurring payment profiles. The maximum number of recurring payments profiles
must not exceed the number of billing agreement details passed as part of the SetExpressCheckout request.
NOTE: The CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request must include either TOKEN or the required credit card information.
NOTE: Tokens expire after approximately 3 hours.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._CREDITCARDTYPE
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with direct payments.
Type of credit card. Character length and limitations: Up to ten single-byte alphabetic characters.
Allowable values: Visa, MasterCard, Discover, Amex, Switch, or Solo. IMPORTANT: If the credit card type is Switch or Solo, the value of
PAYMENTACTION must be Authorization and the CURRENCYCODE must be GBP. In addition, either STARTDATE or ISSUENUMBER must be specified.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._ACCT
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with direct payments.
Credit card number. Character length and limitations: numeric characters only. No spaces or punctutation.
Must conform with modulo and length required by each credit card type. NOTE:You must include either the TOKEN or ACCT fields with the CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile
request. If you specify both, an error is returned.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._EXPDATE
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with direct payments.
Credit card expiration date. Format: MMYYYY Character length and limitations: Six single-byte numeric characters, including leading zero.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.CVV2
member.summary:
Required: Your Merchant Account settings determine whether this field is required.
Card Verification Value, version 2. Character length for Visa, MasterCard, and Discover: exactly three digits.
Character length for American Express: exactly four digits. IMPORTANT: To comply with credit card processing regulations, once a
transaction has been completed, you must not store the value of CVV2.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.ISSUEDATE
member.summary:
Required: No.
Month and year that Switch or Solo card was issued. Format: MMYYYY Character length and limitations: Six single-byte numeric characters, including leading zero.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.ISSUENUMBER
member.summary:
Required: No.
Issue number of Switch or Solo card. Character length: two numeric digits maximum.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._FIRSTNAME
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with direct payments.
Payer’s first name. Character length and limitations: 25 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._LASTNAME
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you are using recurring payments with direct payments.
Payer’s last name. Character length and limitations: 25 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.EMAIL
member.summary:
Required: No.
Payer's email address.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.STREET
member.summary:

First street address. Character length and limitations: 100 single-byte characters.

Second street address. Character length and limitations: 100 single-byte characters.

Name of city. Character length and limitations: 40 single-byte characters.

State or province. Character length and limitations: 40 single-byte characters.

Country code. Character length and limitations: Two single-byte characters.

member.summary:
Required: No.
U.S. ZIP code or other country-specific postal code. Character length and limitations: 20 single-byte characters.

member.summary:
Required: No? Might not be allowed.
IP address of the payer’s browser. IMPORTANT: PayPal records this IP addresses as a means to detect possible fraud.
Character length and limitations: 15 single-byte characters, including periods, for example: 255.255.255.255.
Allowable values: any valid Internet Protocol address.

member.summary:

Full name of the person receiving the product or service paid for by the recurring payment. If not present, the name in the buyer’s PayPal account is used.

member.summary:
Required: Yes, if Ship to Address is specified.
Name of city. Character length and limitations: 40 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.SHIPTOSTATE
member.summary:

State or province. Character length and limitations: 40 single-byte characters.

member.summary:
Required: Yes, if Ship to Address is specified.
U.S. ZIP code or other country-specific postal code. Character length and limitations: 20 single-byte characters.

member.summary:
Required: Yes, if Ship to Address is specified.
Country code. Character limit: Two single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.SHIPTOSTREET2
member.summary:
Required: No.
Second street address. Character length and limitations: 100 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.SHIPTOPHONENUM
member.summary:
Required: No.
Phone number. Character length and limit: 20 single-byte characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._PROFILESTARTDATE
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
The date when billing for this profile begins. Must be a valid date, in UTC/GMT format.
NOTE: The profile may take up to 24 hours for activation.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.PROFILEREFERENCE
member.summary:
Required: No.
The merchant’s own unique reference or invoice number. Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._DESC
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
Description of the recurring payment. NOTE: This field must match the corresponding billing agreement description included in the SetExpressCheckout request.
Character length and limitations: 127 single-byte alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._TRIALBILLINGPERIOD
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you create a trial period.
Unit for billing during the trial period. One of the following values: Day, Week, SemiMonth, Month, or Year
If you create a trial period, TRIALBILLINGPERIOD is required. Otherwise, it is optional. You can create only one trial period per profile.
NOTE: The combination of TRIALBILLINGPERIOD and TRIALBILLINGFREQUENCY cannot exceed one year.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._TRIALBILLINGFREQUENCY
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you create a trial period.
Number of billing periods that make up one billing cycle. NOTE: The combination of billing period and billing frequency cannot exceed one year.
NOTE: If the billing period is SemiMonth. the billing frequency must be 1.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._TRIALAMT
member.summary:
Required: Yes, if you create a trial period.
Billing amount for each billing cycle during the trial period, not including shipping and tax amounts. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.TRIALSHIPPINGAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Shipping amount for each billing cycle during the trial period. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.TRIALTAXAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Tax amount for each billing cycle during the trial period. Limitations: The value must be zero or greater and cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._BILLINGPERIOD
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
The unit of measure for the billing cycle. Must be one of: Day, Week, SemiMonth, Month, or Year.
For SemiMonth, billing is done on the 1st and 15th of each month.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._BILLINGFREQUENCY
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
Number of billing periods that make up one billing cycle. The combination of billing frequency and billing period must be less than or equal to one year.
For example, if the billing cycle is Month, the maximum value for billing frequency is 12. Similarly, if the billing cycle is Week, the maximum value for billing frequency is 52.
NOTE: If the billing period is SemiMonth., the billing frequency must be 1.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.TOTALBILLINGCYCLES
member.summary:
Required: No.
The number of billing cycles in the regular payment period. If no value is specified or the value is 0, the regular payment period continues until
the profile is cancelled or suspended. If the value is greater than 0, the regular payment period starts after the trial period
is finished and continues at the billing frequency for the specified number of cycles.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request._AMT
member.summary:
Required: Yes.
Billing amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period, not including shipping and tax amounts. NOTE: All amounts in the CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request must have the same currency.
Limitations: Value must not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.CURRENCYCODE
member.summary:
Required: No.
A three-character currency code.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.SHIPPINGAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Shipping amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period. NOTE: All amounts in the request must have the same currency.
Limitations: The value cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.TAXAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Tax amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period. NOTE: All amounts in the request must have the same currency.
Limitations: The value cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.MAXFAILEDPAYMENTS
member.summary:
Required: No.
The number of scheduled payments that can fail before the profile is automatically suspended. Character length and limitations: Number string representing an integer.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.AUTOBILLOUTAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
This field indicates whether you would like PayPal to automatically bill the outstanding balance amount in the next billing cycle.
The outstanding balance is the total amount of any previously failed payments. Valid values: Must be NoAutoBill or AddToNextBilling

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.INITAMT
member.summary:
Required: No.
Initial non-recurring payment amount due immediately upon profile creation. Use an initial amount for enrolment or set-up fees.
NOTE: All amounts in the CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request must have the same currency. Limitations: The value cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency.
No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.), and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,).
NOTE: ITEMAMT is required if you specify L_AMTn.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpCreateRecurringPaymentsProfile.Request.FAILEDINITAMTACTION
member.summary:
Required: No.
By default, PayPal will suspend the pending profile in the event that the initial payment amount fails. You can override this default
behavior by setting this field to ContinueOnFailure, which indicates that if the initial payment amount fails, PayPal should add the failed
payment amount to the outstanding balance for this recurring payment profile. When this flag is set to ContinueOnFailure, a success code will be returned
to the merchant in the CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile response and the recurring payments profile will be activated for scheduled billing immediately.
You should check your IPN messages or PayPal account for updates of the payment status. If this field is not set or is set to CancelOnFailure,
PayPal will create the recurring payment profile, but will place it into a pending status until the initial payment is completed. If the initial
payment clears, PayPal will notify you by IPN that the pending profile has been activated. If the payment fails, PayPal will notify you by IPN
that the pending profile has been cancelled. Character length and limitations: ContinueOnFailure or CancelOnFailure

member.summary:
A unique identifier for future reference to the details of this recurring payment.

Status of the recurring payment profile.
ActiveProfile - The recurring payment profile has been successfully created and activated for scheduled payments according the billing instructions from the recurring payments profile.
PendingProfile - The system is in the process of creating the recurring payment profile. Please check your IPN messages for an update.

member.summary:
This field indicates whether you would like PayPal to automatically bill the outstanding balance amount in the next billing cycle.
The outstanding balance is the total amount of any previously failed payments. Valid values: Must be NoAutoBill or AddToNextBilling

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.BILLINGPERIOD
member.summary:
The unit of measure for the billing cycle. Must be one of: Day, Week, SemiMonth, Month, or Year.
NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

summary.para: Number of billing periods that make up one billing cycle.
NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.TOTALBILLINGCYCLES
member.summary: The number of billing cycles in the regular payment period. NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.AMT
member.summary:
Billing amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period,
not including shipping and tax amounts. NOTE:All amounts in the CreateRecurringPaymentsProfile request must have the same currency.
Character length and limitations: Does not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Regardless of currency, decimal separator is a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator is a comma (,). Equivalent to nine characters maximum for USD. NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.SHIPPINGAMT
member.summary:
Shipping amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period.
Limitations: The value cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,). NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.TAXAMT
member.summary:
Tax amount for each billing cycle during the regular payment period.
Limitations: The value cannot exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Must have two decimal places, decimal separator must be a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator must be a comma (,). NOTE: This field is not returned if the profile is cancelled or expired.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.CURRENCYCODE
member.summary: A three-character currency code.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.NEXTBILLINGDATE
member.summary: The next scheduled billing date, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.NUMCYCLESCOMPLETED
member.summary:
The number of billing cycles completed in the current active subscription period.
A billing cycle is considered completed when payment is collected or after retry attempts to collect payment for the current billing cycle have failed.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.NUMCYCLESREMAINING
member.summary: The number of billing cycles remaining in the current active subscription period.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.OUTSTANDINGBALANCE
member.summary:
The current past due or outstanding balance for this profile.
Character length and limitations: Does not exceed $10,000 USD in any currency. No currency symbol. Regardless of currency, decimal separator is a period (.),
and the optional thousands separator is a comma (,). Equivalent to nine characters maximum for USD.

member.name: F:Encore.PayPal.Nvp.NvpGetRecurringPaymentsProfileDetails.Response.FAILEDPAYMENTCOUNT
member.summary: The total number of failed billing cycles for this profile.
